caseTitle: National Database and Registration Authority (NADRA) thr. its Chairman, Islamabad and others v. Jawad Khan
tagline: Discussion: (1) The doctrine of legitimate expectation is equated with fairness and equity. (2) Article 3 of the Constitution casts obligation upon the State to ensure the elimination of all forms of exploitation. (3) According to principle of promissory estoppel when one party by his words or conduct made to the other clear promise it cannot resile.
